title: RCBO – A Big Data Classification Based On an Efficient RCBO Optimization Technique and Apache Spark
abstract: The peculiarity in enormous data is rising bit by bit so the current programming instruments faces inconvenience in management of tremendous data. The proposed improvement estimation is named Rider Chaotic Biography smoothing out (RCBO) computation, which is the joining of the Rider Optimization Algorithm (ROA) and the standard confounded biogeography-based-progression (CBBO). The proposed RCBO-significant stacked auto-encoder using Spark structure effectively handles the huge data for accomplishing incredible colossal data course of action. Here, the proposed RCBO is used for picking sensible features from the colossal dataset.
